sentences.sentence: When your body language communicates reluctance or anxiety, it undercuts the message.
sentences.translation: 当你的肢体语言传达出不情愿或焦虑的情绪时会削弱信息的传达。

sentences.sentence: This undercuts the whole idea of faster cellular speeds.
sentences.translation: 这让提高手机速度的整体创意失色不少。

sentences.sentence: This celebration of opulence and wealth and power undercuts the character of the Statue of Liberty.
sentences.translation: 这种对丰裕、财富和权力的颂扬破坏了自由女神像的特质。
